description:
Ground floor studio with private entrance on Christopher and Gay street. This charming space has a working fireplace, full kitchen and private bathroom. The studio gets plenty of light and looks into to colorful Christopher street. Walking distance to Washington Square Park and Hudson River Park. Many restaurants to choose from and your surrounded by the best nightlife New York had to offer. Conveniently located, with all major subway lines nearby.

Landmark building

Near major subway lines and crosstown bus across the street from apartment
name: Maisonette in West Village
review: Very cosy, great location. Host was very helpful and responsive.
